name: Lonely Journey
description:
Got laid off due to COVID and decided in January 2021 that I would learn to code and try to achieve my goal of becoming a VR developer. This is a simple VR game project which I made by my lonesome.  Also showing what you can do if you really focus on learning programming for 8 months.

==

The goal is nurture the small box worlds with the right elemental ingredients. 

There are four levels to play along with a final challenge level where your goal is to get a highscore. Each level will walk you through what the different element tools at your disposal can do.

Air Element - Give a breath of life to the world

Water Element - Give water yo

Earth - Put some good quality earth on it

Fire element - A flame thrower
